title: r/Prorevenge How We Ruined Our Douchebag Neighbor's Life!
description:
r/Prorevenge In today's story, OP's family has to deal with an incredibly annoying and entitled family who tries to prevent them from building a barn. OP's father is clever, so he carefully creates plans that are exactly compliant with local regulations so that his neighbor can't stop him. Then, he puts up a gigantic sign that blocks his neighbor's view as the final touch of revenge! If you like this podcast and want to see more, hit the follow button!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_2pQO1GC9Lk
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
